Final Exam Schedule Information: The final exam schedule for the Spring 2025 semester was released on April 15, 2025. Students can access the exam schedule through the student portal or view it on department bulletin boards.

Exam Format Information: All final examinations for the Spring 2025 semester will be conducted on campus in a traditional in-person format. Students must bring their university ID cards for verification purposes.

Exam Location for CSC 226: The final exam for CSC 226 (Introduction to Database) will be held in the Technology Building, Room TB-305. Students should arrive 15 minutes before the scheduled exam time.
Exam Accommodation Information: Students requiring special accommodations for their exams must submit their requests to the Office of Student Services at least two weeks before the exam date.
Make-up Exam Policy: Students who miss their scheduled exam due to documented illness or emergency must contact their course instructor within 24 hours to arrange for a make-up exam.
Exam Location for CSC 305: The final exam for CSC 305 (System Analysis and Design) will be held in the Science Hall, Room SH-210.
Exam Location for CSC 312: The final exam for CSC 312 (Computer Architecture) will be held in the Technology Building, Room TB-201.
Exam Location for CSC 316: The final exam for CSC 316 (Fundamentals of Computer Security) will be held in the Science Hall, Room SH-310.
Exam Location for CSC 317: The final exam for CSC 317 (Information Assurance and Security) will be held in the Technology Building, Room TB-305.
Exam Location for CSC 345: The final exam for CSC 345 (Fundamentals of Computer Network Management) will be held in the Engineering Building, Room EB-110.
Exam Location for CSC 385: The final exam for CSC 385 (Internet Computing) will be held in the Technology Building, Room TB-205.
Exam Location for CSC 405: The final exam for CSC 405 (Systems Integration) will be held in the Science Hall, Room SH-215.
Exam Location for CSC 414: The final exam for CSC 414 (Applied Operating Systems) will be held in the Technology Building, Room TB-301.
Exam Location for CSC 425: The final exam for CSC 425 (Data Communications and Computer Networks) will be held in the Engineering Building, Room EB-120.
Exam Location for CSC 446: The final exam for CSC 446 (Applied Database Systems) will be held in the Technology Building, Room TB-305.
Exam Location for CSC 450: The final exam for CSC 450 (Human-Computer Interaction) will be held in the Science Hall, Room SH-220.
Exam Location for CSC 463: The final exam for CSC 463 (Advanced Software Development) will be held in the Technology Building, Room TB-210.
Exam Location for CSC 480: The final exam for CSC 480 (Internship) will be held in the Engineering Building, Room EB-130.
Exam Location for CSC 490: The final exam for CSC 490 (Senior Study) will be held in the Science Hall, Room SH-230.
Exam Location for ENG 101: The final exam for ENG 101 (English Composition) will be held in the Humanities Building, Room HB-105.
Exam Location for MTH 110: The final exam for MTH 110 (Pre-Calculus Mathematics) will be held in the Science Hall, Room SH-310.
Exam Location for COM 201: The final exam for COM 201 (Public Speaking) will be held in the Humanities Building, Room HB-110.

Exam Materials Information: Students are advised to bring blue or black pens, pencils, erasers, and calculators (where permitted) to their exams. Electronic devices other than approved calculators are not allowed in the examination rooms.
Exam Duration Policy: Each exam is scheduled for a duration of 2 hours. Students arriving more than 30 minutes late will not be permitted to take the exam.
